DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effect of gabapentin on polysomnographic assessments in transient insomnia induced by a sleep phase advance.
DOC.brief_title: A Polysomnographic Study Of Single-Dose Gabapentin In Transient Insomnia
DOC.criteria: Aged >/= 18 years who reported occasional sleeplessness in the month prior to screening Females of childbearing potential using medicallyacceptable method of birth control >/= 1 month prior to screening Current or recent history (within 2 years) of sleep disorder (excessive snoring, obstructive sleep apnea, chronic painful condition) Currently taking or expected to take any of the following during the trial: amphetamines, benzodiazepines, cocaine, marijuana, methaqualone, methadone, opiates, propoxyphene, barbituates, and phencyclidine
